document.full_text: nba leaders san antonio are mired in their longest losing streak of the season after a 100-92 loss to the portland trail blazers on monday without three key players earned the spurs a fourth consecutive defeat.
document.title: ailing san antonio spurs drop fourth in a row
lines_and_colors: nba leaders san antonio are mired in their longest losing streak of the season after a 100-92 loss to the portland trail blazers on monday without three key players earned the spurs a fourth consecutive defeat.
